flawed_nl_solution:
He can buy 12 artichokes because 15 / 1.25 = <<15/1.25=12>>12
Each artichoke makes 0.17 ounces of dip because there are 3 artichokes per 5 ounces
He can make 20 ounces of dip because 12 x (5/3) = 60/3 = <<12*(5/3)=20>>20
#### 20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1.6666666666666667, not 0.1666666667. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
